snippet: The Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday proposed new rules that would require drug and medical device makers to disclose risks of products on social media platforms.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration proposes new rules that will require drug and medical device makers to disclose risks, along with benefits, of products on social media platforms, even when the allowable length of messages is very limited as on Twitter.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration on Tuesday proposed new rules that would require drug and medical device makers to disclose risks of products on social media platforms.

headline.main: F.D.A. Proposes Rules for Listing Risks on Social Media
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Proposes Rules for Listing Risks on Social Media
